video.title: Red Data Girl
video.synopsis: This anime series follows the adventures of 15-year-old Izumiko, a vessel for an immortal goddess, and Miyuki, a boy who serves as her guardian.

episodes.synopsis: Shy 15-year-old Izumiko, who has an effect on technology that she doesn't yet understand, is curious when an old nemesis transfers to her school.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Something seems to be keeping Izumiko from reaching her mother's house. When she and Miyuki finally arrive, a clue to Izumiko's legacy is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Wamiya notices that Izumiko has changed her mind about Miyuki, a development he decides requires drastic measures.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A family tragedy and a revelation about the school's top student set the stage for a demonstration of Izumiko's powers.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Izumiko and Miyuki's joy at their friends' power is short-lived; Miyuki grows enraged at his father for taking an assignment at the school.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: On a train ride to a mountain retreat, Izumiko learns more about Mayura and Manatsu and soon discovers the importance of the trip's destination.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Mayura and Masumi set out to prove that Miyuki is more than he claims to be, and Manatsu learns that his faithful horse Tabi is sick.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Tabi's death, Manatsu decides to join with Masumi and leave, but Izumiko hopes they'll stay with Mayura.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Izumiko finds herself growing more rebellious as her role as Mayura's chief weapon in the battle against Takayanagi draws closer.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Takayanagi may be up to something when the school festival brings rumors of a curse and a haunted house that's making students sick.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Takayanagi casts a spell on Izumiko to make her do his bidding, but she remains resistant to his plotting.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Izumiko vanishes into an alternate reality. As humanity's fate hangs in the balance, Miyuki, Takayanagi and Wamiya attempt to bring her back.
episodes.title: Episode 12
